product-list.name: Cocoa Half Leather Sofa
product-list.title: For the love of Cocoa!
shortDes: Our latest sofa, Cocoa is the perfect half leather sofa for all who love affordable luxury.
The rich brown color, coupled with the comfortable seating make this sofa everyoneâ€™s favorite!
The sleek legs, give this luxurious sofa a trendy look and feel.

product-list.description: Relax and lounge in this luxurious USA designed sofa! Seat cushions crafted with high resilience foam, layers of innovative pearl foam and fiber provide unprecedented levels of comfort. Contemporary pillow back design adds to the luxurious style. Solid wood frame & high resilience foam ensure long term durability. Fully customizable by size, configuration, fabric & color
